lead_paragraph: U.S. and Canadian scientists are planning to spend the next five years studying flooding on Lake Champlain and the Richelieu River, which drains the lake north into Quebec, and whether methods can be developed to control future flooding.
snippet: U.S. and Canadian scientists are planning to spend the next five years studying flooding on Lake Champlain and the Richelieu River, which drains the lake north into Quebec, and whether methods can be developed to control future flooding....

headline.print_headline: Trump Inherits Secret Cyberwar on North Korea
headline.main: Trump Inherits a Secret Cyberwar Against North Korean Missiles
